bio: An armored cat Yo-kai who once defended a king, and he will put his life on the line for his master.

soultimate.name: Excalipurr
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Drops incoming damage by 20% and gives super armor.
skill.name: Deeply Enarmored

name: Sir Nyansalot
